supplies.

for Mr. Fox.

I went back to the Peninsula Hotel and got to bed about
a.M.,
pretty well tired out, with a bad cough and a game leg

The air raid alarm sounded
about, quarter to seven, but I decided not to get up. The release
1n about 15 minutes and in another 15 minutes the alarm

and got up.
So I decided it was useless to attempt to sleep,
I had breakfast and went over to the Police Station
to get a permit to go to longkong•
The air raid alarm sounded
again
just as our ferry arrived.
On the second day,
apparently,
they let the ferries run during the air raiu period, so I got over
